summary: The Protect DSH Act (H.R. 3581) aims to delay reductions in payments to disproportionate share hospitals (DSH) under the Medicaid program. This delay, amending Section 1923(f) of the Social Security Act, pushes back the implementation of these payment cuts from the years 2026-2028 to 2029-2031. The bill was introduced by Mr. Crenshaw and referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce.
